overview: Brad was the Director of Corporate Sales and Service for GetMeIn, and part of the management team that facilitated their acquisition by Ticketmaster. Prior to that, Brad spent two years as National Corporate Sales Director for StubHub, where he built the corporate services platform and partnered with over 200 corporate clients. Prior to StubHub, Brad worked for Charles Schwab for eight years in marketing, product development, relationship management and business development. Brad has a passion for helping clients be successful. Brad was an All-American athlete in Nebraska, and graduated from the University of Pennsylvania.
